self.title: CDISC Questionnaire SF10 v1.0 Children Standard Test Name Terminology

definition: Short Form 10 Health Survey for Children Standard, US Version 1.0 test name.
name: Short Form 10 Health Survey for Children Standard, US Version 1.0 Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire SF10 v1.0 Children Standard Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Short Form 10 Health Survey for Children Standard, US Version 1.0 Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time do you think your child acted bothered or upset?
terms.preferredTerm: SF10 v1.0 Children Standard - Acted Bothered or Upset

terms.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, has your child been limited in any activities due to HEALTH problems - bending, lifting, or stooping?
terms.preferredTerm: SF10 v1.0 Children Standard - Bending, Lifting, Stooping

terms.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, has your child been limited in any activities due to HEALTH problems - Doing things that take some energy such as riding a bike or skating?
terms.preferredTerm: SF10 v1.0 Children Standard - Doing Things That Take Some Energy
terms.submissionValue: SF101-Doing Things That Take Some Energy
synonyms: SF101-Doing Things That Take Some Energy

terms.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, has your child been limited in the KIND of schoolwork or activities with friends he/she could do because of EMOTIONAL or BEHAVIORAL problems?.
terms.preferredTerm: SF10 v1.0 Children Standard - Emotional: Schoolwork, Activities

terms.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how satisfied do you think your child has felt about his/her friendships?
terms.preferredTerm: SF10 v1.0 Children Standard - Felt About His/Her Friendships

terms.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how satisfied do you think your child has felt about his/her life overall?
terms.preferredTerm: SF10 v1.0 Children Standard - Felt About His/Her Life Overall

terms.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Standard, US Version 1.0 - Compared to other children your child's age, in general would you say his/her behavior is.
terms.preferredTerm: SF10 v1.0 Children Standard - His/Her Behavior Is

terms.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much bodily pain or discomfort has your child had?
terms.preferredTerm: SF10 v1.0 Children Standard - How Much Bodily Pain Child Had
terms.submissionValue: SF101-How Much Bodily Pain Child Had
synonyms: SF101-How Much Bodily Pain Child Had

terms.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Standard, US Version 1.0 - In general, would you say your child's health is.
terms.preferredTerm: SF10 v1.0 Children Standard - In General You Say Child Health Is
terms.submissionValue: SF101-In General You Say Child Health Is
synonyms: SF101-In General You Say Child Health Is

terms.definition: The Short Form 10 Health Survey Children Standard, US Version 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, has your child been limited in the KIND of schoolwork or activities with friends he/she could do because of PHYSICAL health problems?
terms.preferredTerm: SF10 v1.0 Children Standard - Physical: Schoolwork, Activities
